replies.body: Uhhhhh, I hate the EULA. So what would happen with our current donations? Do we get it back?!
replies.body_tagged: Uhhhhh, I hate the EULA. So what would happen with our current donations? Do we get it back?!

replies.body: I would like to know if it will effect the ranks like gold, emerald, and diamond. I was wanting to buy one, but if we are just going to get the ranks taken away then I don't want to spend my money on it. Several people have told me that EULA shouldn't effect the ranks because they are just xp boosts, but some have told me different. Can someone give me a real answer?
replies.body_tagged: I would like to know if it will effect the ranks like gold, emerald, and diamond. replies.body:
Hola Fai! Long time no see! (its gilletteracer74) Feel free to Skype me anytime so we can catch up! 
As for the post, yes, we have seen the changes in the EULA, and we are changing according to the new EULA.

replies.body:
Mojang just basically ruined Minecraft multiplayer. Close to no one will by ranks..
But if you're going to buy a rank, BUY A SUBSCRIPTION so you won't pay as much but still get all the perks. Also, it will help the server more because you'll have to pay again and again if you still want it. About to get diamond subscription.

replies.body: umm will there be charges to go into avicus?
replies.body_tagged: umm will there be charges to go into avicus?

replies.body: Well mojang said it, that you can not charge hard money(real money) for something that lets other players get XP faster so like the ranks will no longer be able to yeild more XP.
